definition: essence/extract/vitality/energy/semen/sperm/mythical goblin spirit/highly perfected/elite/the pick of sth/proficient (refined ability)/extremely (fine)/selected rice (archaic)

sentences.english: Heavy Armourer can significantly improve the armour available to new and retrained units.
sentences.chinese: 重甲工坊可以爲軍隊提供更爲精良的盔甲。

sentences.english: Well armed and equipped Norse swordsmen. Able to wear chain and plate armour.
sentences.chinese: 北歐劍士裝備極爲精良，身穿鍊甲或板甲。

sentences.english: Master Armourer substantially improves the armour available to new and retrained units.
sentences.chinese: 盔甲大師工坊可以爲軍隊提供更爲精良的盔甲。

sentences.english: To capture lots of viewers, you need to have a well-designed navigation.
sentences.chinese: 爲捉住遊覽者，你需要有一個設計精良的導航。

sentences.english: And I'm sure our well-made teddy bears will meet your satisfaction.
sentences.chinese: 我相信我們的做工精良的玩具熊會使你們滿意的。

sentences.english: From this vantage point, a diploma starts to look a lot like a receipt printed on fine cardstock.
sentences.chinese: 從這一點來看，文憑不過是一張製作精良的收據。

sentences.english: Well armoured Pikemen made up of Scottish nobles preferring to fight in the infantry.
sentences.chinese: 蘇格蘭貴族組成的槍兵，盔甲精良，爲精銳步兵部隊。

sentences.english: Living near a well with anyoneuis pump is like in Eden.
sentences.chinese: 近一個精良的生活與手動泵，就像伊甸園正在籌商。

sentences.english: This is one incredibly well-made bypass pruner .
sentences.chinese: 這是一個令人難以置信的製作精良的旁路剪。

sentences.english: But only well-executed objects can be beautiful.
sentences.chinese: 然而，只有經過精良製作的物品才能美。

sentences.english: The Gaddafi troops are better equipped they say.
sentences.chinese: 他們說，卡扎菲的軍隊裝備更加精良。

sentences.english: There are more than 200 well-maintained instruments in the department.
sentences.chinese: 本系所現有二百多臺維護精良的精密儀器。

sentences.english: Mail armour gives them the same protection as contemporary knights.
sentences.chinese: 精良鍊甲令貴族騎兵的防護絕不遜於同時期任何騎兵。

sentences.english: My reserch favours functionality and quality craftsmanship.
sentences.chinese: 我偏好功能性與品質精良的工藝。

sentences.english: With securest wishes for a cheerful New Year!
sentences.chinese: 祝新年高興，並致以精良的祝福。

sentences.english: Most successful marketing tales begin and end with a well-plumbed niche.
sentences.chinese: 許多成功的營銷佳話都源自定位精良的利基。

definition: to churn out large quantities without regard for quality (idiom); rough and slipshod work
standardized/standard (service, method etc)/regulation (clothing etc)/formulaic/(telecommunications etc) system/format (e.g. the PAL or NTSC systems for TV signals)
faultless/complete/perfect/to leave nothing to be desired
